Description_lang: The One-Armed Bandit blasts out smoky exhaust at all players every $469993t1 sec for $469993d. Each blast absorbs the next $s1 healing received. While this effect persists, it inflicts $s4 Shadow damage every $t4 sec and reduces movement speed by $s2% per application.
AuraDescription_lang: $w1 healing absorbed.$s4 Shadow damage inflicted every $t4 sec.Movement speed reduced by $s2%.
